metadata.title: CVE-2021-20281 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: It was possible for some users without permission to view other users' fullnames to do so via the online users block in moodle before 3.10.2, 3.9.5,3.8.8, 3.5.17.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
